text: Ke kaloku kwabo bangasalindelekanga ukuya exesheni phakathi kwabafazi benu ukuba niyathandabuza, elabo ixesha ziinyanga ezintathu, kanti nakwabo bangekayi exesheni. Bona abo bamithiyo ixesha labo (lokulinda emva koqhawulo mtshato) kukuba bade bazale nabani na ke omoyikayo uAll√¢h, Uya kumenzela lula umcimbi wakhe
